about-info: I'm a frontend developer focused on building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. I work mainly with JavaScript and React, paying close attention component-based architecture and usability. I am constantly improving my skills and enjoy learning new technologies that help me create better experiences.
about-degrees: I'm currently studying web development, with a strong focus on frontend technologies. During my studies, I have gained practical experience in HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, React, Git and Redux. This background allows me to combine theoretical knowledge with real-world development practices.
